website_summaries.verdict: Prey owes a lot to its heritage, but still offers some cool new twists on old ideas. While it would've been nice to see Prey venture farther from shore, the shooter provides a fantastic iteration of existing concepts.
pros: Mechanics offer a bevy of solutions to different challenges
cons: Minor frame rate and quest tracking issues

customer_reviews.title: No probs Prey is a good AAA PC game
customer_reviews.text: Got this on pre-order and the game works with no bugs and I'm into 5-6 hours of gameplay. I'm saying this because the demo for this game was only released on consoles so most of the time that means the PC version could have some problem that means you can't play it until a patch comes out etc. No problems here it's a good AAA title.
customer_reviews.author: L.Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very much in the Dishonoured style but that's a good thing in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Runs well on my i5. Very much in the Dishonoured style but that's a good thing in my opinion. One small bug regards loss of sound but a reboot fixes that. Some of the aliens are a bit tough in relation to your own firepower but still a good game.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Really good game. Replayable. Multiple ways to complete main and side missions/stories. Not a short game, you do get your monies worth.
customer_reviews.author: Phlip

customer_reviews.title: Tedious
customer_reviews.text: First the good news the engine, architecture and controls are excellent. However the gameplay is derivative and unimaginative. Collecting keys and keycodes, killing lots of black swirly things and the repetitive scavenge, recycle, fabricate becomes very tedious very quickly. I finally got terminally bored in the deep storage facility and can't be bothered to finish the game.
customer_reviews.author: Glazunov5

customer_reviews.title: Brill PC Game
customer_reviews.text: Superb game and cheaper than anywhere else i could find. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David Hill

customer_reviews.title: I am still coming to terms with the game play ...
customer_reviews.text: I am still coming to terms with the game play - it as a different look to my normal FPS games - Long way to go yet but worth a try if the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Birch

customer_reviews.title: Just stay alive to finish it!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had much time to play it lately, but it certainly looks good so far.
customer_reviews.author: TerryM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great game but it takes a while to get to grips with but this only makes it better
customer_reviews.author: l j stanfordmettis

customer_reviews.title: Good graphics, not yet excited by it.
customer_reviews.text: Good graphics, have not progressed very far yet but I'm not moved by it yet.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Prey (pc) game
customer_reviews.text: Nice game with a slightly different angle from other role playing FPS games.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good game but it needs to be played twice to get the real hang of it
customer_reviews.author: Delroy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying playing this game totally different from the games I normally play.
customer_reviews.author: H Kadziola

customer_reviews.title: Worth the time and money
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun, very polished (experienced no bugs or crashes,) and entertaining storyline. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E. Kristiansen

customer_reviews.title: Good game if you like dishonered
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this game so far. It can be a bit of a run about but if you do all the side quests as you go it doesn't take long to learn the layout of the game world.
customer_reviews.author: alix morrison

customer_reviews.title: Exciting
customer_reviews.text: Good game with some interesting features. Smooth graphic. Runs fine, but has some bugs especially with saving the game and reloading.
customer_reviews.author: Werner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Not immpreseed by this PC port of a console game. The interface is horribly 'clunky' no amount of playing (I managed 2 hours before abandoning the game) makes this bearable. Graphically, the game is okay - but only okay. I don't recommend this game - especially not at the current price
customer_reviews.author: J. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty derivative. Resi 7 was much better I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty derivative. Resi 7 was much better I thought for current games. Doesn't quite have the atmosphere of SS2, but it is entertaining and takes some skill on hard.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Prey (Half Life)
customer_reviews.text: I Have only started to play, game looks good so far but the start.. well first you put on a protection suit, then you travel on a helicopter (not a tram) Have a little talk at the reception desk and they said "They are waiting for you in the test lab" and do some tests then thing start to go wrong. Aliens start to appear. and don`t forget to pick up your trusty pipe wrench and flash light....
customer_reviews.author: Big Daz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing, very disappointing. Feels like something from the early 2000s and allegedly based on the doom 3 engine. No idea why its an 18 rating totally tame and boring,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Engaging, atmospheric and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Runs extremely well with an i3-6100 and a GTX 1060. Max settings with smooth gameplay. As for gameplay, it's a great mixture of inventory, crafting, upgrading, surviving, fighting and fleeing. The story keeps you tied in, while giving you the "skyrim" feedom to do whatever you want. Nothing makes me feel better than second guessing every object and constantly checking how food I have left. A brilliant game that has some amazing re-play value (already planning a third full playthrough).
customer_reviews.author: Callum Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the original game.
customer_reviews.text: Too much like "Half-Life 2", I played it for about fifteen minutes and got bored. Nothing like the original game.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Utterly boring and frustrating game. Gave up half way through due to boredom
customer_reviews.author: ret

customer_reviews.title: Really great game. My PC Specs
customer_reviews.text: Really great game. My PC Specs: Nvidia GTX 980 Intel Core i5 4690K (Overclocked to up to 4GHz) 8GB 1600MHz DDR3 Memory I'm running at very high settings at 2556x1440 resolution and it's very smooth. Graphics look slightly dated but overall I think the deign and feel is excellent. I'm about 12 hours in and really enjoying it. Story line is excellent, great section of weapons etc..
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rh Childs

product_meta.title: Prey (PC)
product_meta.description:
Prey Is A First-Person Sci-Fi Action Game From Arkane Studios, Creators Of The Award-Winning Dishonoured Series. In Prey, You Are The First Human Enhanced With Alien Powers Aboard The Talos I Space Station. Improvise And Innovate As You Fight Your Way Through The Alien Infested Station In Your Search For The Truth Cosmonaut Shotgun Starter Pack Pre-Order Bonus: Fans Who Pre-Order Prey Will Receive The Exclusive Cosmonaut Shotgun Pack. The Pre-Order Bonus Consists Of Morgan Yue's Family Heirloom Margrave Shotgun And Tools To Fight Threats Aboard Talos I Including: Three Neuromods Players Can Spend To Acquire New Abilities, Two Med kits, A Fabrication Plan To Create The Shotgun And Ammo, A Starter Kit For Building Tools And Weapons, And A Unique Upgrade To Help Players Preserve Their Limited Resources.

BOX CONTAINS
DVD ROM and Pre-order code in box
feature_bullets: Prey is a first-person sci-fi action game from Arkane Studios, creators of the award-winning Dishonored series.
In Prey, you are the first human enhanced with alien powers aboard the Talos I space station.
Improvise and innovate as you fight your way through the alien infested station in your search for the truth
Prey is a bold new story set in a dangerous universe.
Fans who pre-order Prey will receive the exclusive Cosmonaut Shotgun Pack.
